home.searchPlaceholder: Search By Perpetual Name / Perpetual Symbol
home.emergencyPrompt: This perpetual contract is in emergency.
home.clearedPrompt: The perpetual contract has been cleared.

contractInfo.openInterestPrompt: Total size of positions per side.

riskParams.previewTip: Please finish step 1, 2 and 3 to preview the Order Book.
riskParams.halfSpreadPrompt: Half spread refers to half of the difference between best ask price and best bid price.  We recommend the half spread as the same as the oracle derivation. ex: 0.1%.
riskParams.closeSlippagePrompt: A larger beta2 increases slippage when close position. We recommend 70% * beta1 according to the volatility of the underlying asset.
riskParams.openSlippagePrompt: A larger beta1 increases slippage when open position. We recommend 0.01 ~ 0.7 according to the volatility of the underlying asset. 0.01 means that the slippage is 1% when the AMM position is 1x leverage.
riskParams.minPrompt: The operator can set a min value of the risk parameters and adjust the risk parameters within this range. The operator can initiate the governance process to change the range of the risk parameters.
riskParams.ammMaxLeveragePrompt: Max leverage of AMM's margin account. We recommend 1x.
riskParams.maxPrompt: The operator can set a max value of the risk parameters and adjust the risk parameters within this range. The operator can initiate the governance process to change the range of the risk parameters.
riskParams.fundingRateLimitPrompt: Funding rate limit refers to the maximum funding rate of Perpetual. A bigger gamma increases the funding rate. Funding rate is the ratio of position value that every position needs to collect per 8 hours which is a significant component when perpetual swap anchors the spot price. We recommend 0.5% ~ 10% according to the volatility of the underlying asset.
riskParams.closePriceDiscountPrompt: Max discount of price when close position. For example, if index price is $100 and δ is 5%, the bid price will not higher than $105 and the ask price will not lower than $95.
riskParams.baseFundingRatePrompt: Base Funding Rate is a risk parameter, which aims to account for the difference in interest rates of the base and quote currencies.
riskParams.fundingRateFactorPrompt: Funding rate factor refers to the coefficient of funding rate. A bigger gamma increases the funding rate. Funding rate is the ratio of position value that every position needs to collect per 8 hours which is a significant component when perpetual swap anchors the spot price. We recommend 0.5% ~ 10% according to the volatility of the underlying asset.

contractParams.maintenanceMarginRatePrompt:
Determines the leverage when position is liquidated; Smaller than the initial margin rate;
Alterable by LP Governance (only decrements are allowed)
contractParams.insuranceFundCapPrompt: The upper limit of the insurance fund
contractParams.insuranceFundRatePrompt:
The ratio of penalty that goes to the insurance fund;
Alterable by LP Governance
contractParams.vaultFeeRatePrompt:
The rate of trading fee that enters the DAO Treasury;
Alterable by SATORI DAO Governance
contractParams.operatorFeeRatePrompt:
The rate of trading fee that goes to operator;
Less than 1%; Alterable by LP Governance
contractParams.liquidationPenaltyRatePrompt:
Liquidation Penalty Rate (1.015%) = Penalty Rate (1%) + Treasury Fee (0.015%)
Liquidation Penalty = Position Value ⨉ Liquidation Penalty Rate (1.015%)
Liquidation penalty rate will be lower than the maintenance margin rate; the rate is alterable by LP Governance.
contractParams.referrerRebatePrompt:
The rate of referral fee from the Operator Fee and LP Fee;
Alterable by LP Governance
contractParams.initialMarginRatePrompt:
= 1 / max leverage;
The parameter can be altered by LP Governance (only decrements)
contractParams.lpFeeRatePrompt:
The rate of trading fee that goes to LP;
Less than 1%; Alterable by LP Governance
contractParams.maxLeveragePrompt:
Determines the max leverage when open position;
The parameter can be altered by LP Governance (only increments)
contractParams.keeperGasRewardPrompt:
When keeper executes liquidation or reviews accounts during settlement,
they receive a fixed amount of reward to pay for Gas; Alterable by LP Governance,
it is recommended to set the number of the collateral token worth $15
contractParams.keeperGasRewardTip: Please fill up this field. It is recommended to provide $20 worth of tokens.
contractParams.maxOpenInterestRatePrompt: The ratio between maximum open interest to liquidity pool margin.
contractParams.defaultTargetLeveragePrompt: The default leverage (integer) is between 1x and the max leverage
contractParams.displayPrompt:
Vanilla, price is displayed as {collateral},PNL = (mark price - entry price) * amount({underlying})
Inverse, price is displayed as {underlying},PNL = (entry price - mark price) * amount({collateral})

poolInfo.runPoolPrompt: You need to create at least one perpetual contract for the pool before you can run the pool.

poolInfoTable.modifyPrompt: The perpetual contract is not in normal operation, so this operation cannot be performed.

poolInfo.insuranceFundPrompt:
Insurance fund is used to cover liquidation loss. There are two insurance funds. The first fund comes from donation and the second fund comes from the liquidation penalty. If the second fund reaches a max size, liquidation penalty will be transferred to LP.

1. First fund: {donate} {collateralUnit}
2. Second fund: {fund} {collateralUnit}
Second Fund Cap: {cap} {collateralUnit}
poolInfo.perpetualNameChangePrompt: The perpetual contract is not in normal operation, so this operation cannot be performed.

addLiquidityRiskDialog.title: Risk Disclaimer
addLiquidityRiskDialog.riskWarningText: Adding liquidity to the AMM is not risk-free; users can suffer losses when drawbacks happen. For a detailed explanation, please review LP Revenue and Risks. Please be careful, and make sure you are fully aware tha you might suffer losses from adding liquidity.

poolList.searchTip: Search Pool Address / Perpetual Symbol / Perpetual Name
poolList.miningIconToolTip: Add liquidity to this pool to earn fake SATORI.
poolList.apyPrompt:
Total APY = LP APY + Mining APY.
LP APY is calculated from the latest 30-day average.

liquidityPage.removePenaltyPrompt: AMM charges withdrawal fees to the remaining liquidity providers. Normally, the fee is a small percentage of your withdrawal. The fee increases when the pool suffers from insufficient liquidity.
liquidityPage.withdrawSettlePrompt: One or more perpetual contract in this pool is in emergency, part of your liquidity cannot be removed at this point.
liquidityPage.addLiqPerpetualErrorPrompt: An error has occurred, the pool is not available for adding liquidity.
liquidityPage.addLiqNotRunningPrompt: The operator hasn't ran the contract yet, not available for adding liquidity.
liquidityPage.removeLiqPerpetualErrorPrompt: An error has occurred, not available for removing liquidity.
liquidityPage.removeLiqNotRunningPrompt: The operator hasn't ran the contract yet, not available for removing liquidity.
liquidityPage.removeLiqLPLockedPrompt: The LP token is locked due to the recent voting activity, not available for removing liquidity.
liquidityPage.maxRemoveShare: Insufficient liquidity for this pool. Max available:
liquidityPage.removalSlippagePrompt: AMM charges withdrawal fees to the remaining liquidity providers. Normally, the fee is a small percentage of your withdrawal. The fee increases when the pool suffers from insufficient liquidity.
liquidityPage.removeLiquidityLockPrompt: Your liquidity is currently locked, and you can’t remove liquidity until {time}.
liquidityPage.lockTimePrompt:
The lock time is calculated based on the block generation time of {number} L1 blocks.

1 L1 block generation time = {time}

If you add liquidity multiple times, the lock time will adjust based on your latest deposit.
liquidityPage.lockTimeDetail: After adding liquidity, there will be a {lockTime} on your LP tokens. No transfer nor liquidity removal can be processed for the LP tokens before the unlock time.

transferOperator.title: Transfer Operator
transferOperator.prompt: This operation is irreversible. Please be careful.

liquidationPage.operationTip: To “liquidate” is to transfer the liquidated position to AMM, and the user will receive a fixed amount of “keeper gas reward”. To “take over” means that the user can own part of or all of the liquidated position and receive the corresponding amount of “liquidation penalty”.

poolProposal.onlyOperatorCreateProposalTip: Only operator can initiate a proposal.
poolProposal.hasActiveProposalTip: There is still an unresolved proposal regarding this perpetual Contract. Please try again when there is not ongoing voting.
poolProposal.operatorHasExpiredTip: The operator for this pool has expired, please make sure there are enough votes to create a proposal.
poolProposal.liquidityTip: Liquidity cannot be removed until voting is complete.

cookie.policyDetail: We use cookies in order to optimize the site and improve it continuously and to give you the best experience if you use to continue this site or click the accept button.

graphBanner.graphErrorText: The Graph service is currently out of sync; funding, PNL, order history, APY, AMM positions, stats, and other related info are affected. The service will recover after all blocks are synced.</br>Current progress: {graphBlockNumber} / {currentBlockNumber} blocks are synced

mcbSale.stakeDoc: I acknowledge that I fully understand the risks in the follow investment documentations.
mcbSale.auditReport: The sale smart contract is audited by Certik. Audit Report

positionsAndOrders.orderAmount: Number of contracts in an order.
positionsAndOrders.size:
Your position on this instrument.
If positive, you are long, if negative, short.
positionsAndOrders.orderCanceled: Number of contracts in an order that have been cancelled. View the order details page for more information.
positionsAndOrders.symbol: The ticker symbol of the contract this position represents.
positionsAndOrders.liqPrice: Your position will be liquidated when mark price reaches this price.
positionsAndOrders.orderFillPrice: Calculated average price of all fills in an order.
positionsAndOrders.orderDetails: Show all the details of an order including basic information, trades and cancel reasons.
positionsAndOrders.infinityPrompt: This position has sufficient margin and will not be liquidated.
positionsAndOrders.levPrompt:
This is the current actual leverage of your position
Actual Leverage = Position Value/(Margin - Keeper Gas Reward)

The actual leverage will change as the position value, margin value and PNL change.

You can alter the actual leverage by changing the margin or opening new positions with different leverages under the same perpetual contract.
positionsAndOrders.orderLevPrompt: The leverage you selected when placing the order
positionsAndOrders.entryPrice: Average executed buy/sell price for your current long/short position.
positionsAndOrders.orderFilled: Number of contracts in an order that have been bought/sold.
positionsAndOrders.orderPrice: Limit Price. Market orders does not have this value.
positionsAndOrders.positionPnl: Realized profit and loss (including funding) on this position.
positionsAndOrders.value: The current notional value of this position.
positionsAndOrders.orderClosedAt: The time when the order is closed.
positionsAndOrders.funding: The total amount of funds you have paid / received since the position was opened.
positionsAndOrders.markPrice: The mark price is the price at which the perpetual contract will be valued during trading hours. This can (temporarily) vary from the actual perpetual market prices to protect against manipulative trading.
positionsAndOrders.margin: The margin balance of this position. You can decrease/increase the leverage by depositing/withdrawing funds.
positionsAndOrders.unknownValue: This value is unknown. The graph service is syncing.
positionsAndOrders.marginRatioPrompt: The lower the Margin Ratio, the lower your liquidation level will be relative to your position size. Your positions will be liquidated once Margin Ratio reaches 100%.

recentTrades.price: The color indicates the taker's side: green means buy and orange means sell.

statisticsBar.Volume24h: The total contracts traded in the past 24 hours in SATORI.

claim.onEthereum: Please switch to Ethereum MainNet to claim SATORI

statisticsBar.accumulatedFundingRatePrompt: The accumulated funding rate over the past 8 hours. If a trader opens 1 long positions, the accumulated funding fee he/she paid/received during the past 8 hours = accumulated funding rate × current index price × 1.

connectWallet.confirmConnection2: Scan QR code with a WalletConnect-compatible wallet
connectWallet.caption: Connect Wallet

status.indexChange24HPrompt: Index price change in the past 24 hours
status.fundingRatePrompt: The calculated funding rate for this moment. This is the rate that longs will pay shorts. If negative, shorts pay longs.
status.markPricePrompt: The mark price is the price at which the perpetual contract will be valued during trading hours. This can (temporarily) vary from the actual perpetual market prices to protect against manipulative trading.
status.indexPricePrompt: The spot price index of underlying asset.
status.intervalFundingPrompt: The funding rate for the next funding payment. This is the rate that longs will pay shorts. If negative, shorts pay longs.
status.countdownPrompt: Countdown to the next funding payment.
status.maximumLeverage: The maximum leverage is set by the operator

newContract.operatorGuidebook: Please read the Operator Guidebook thoroughly regarding how to create and manage your perpetual contract.
newContract.allowSuperOperator: When adding a new perpetual in this pool while it's running, I would like to skip the LP voting procedure
newContract.newPoolMessage: Once the liquidity pool starts running, the perpetual whose liquidity is provided by this liquidity pool starts running as well. From now on, any new perpetual that uses liquidity in the liquidity pool has to go through the voting process by LP before starting to work.
newContract.operatorCheckInTip: Please check in on the info page of the liquidity pool every 7 days.
newContract.oracleSearch: Search a oracle name or address
newContract.successProposalMessage: Congratulations, you have successfully created a proposal for creating perpetual, if the proposal is approved, the perpetual will be automatically created. Select “Continue To Add Perpetual“ to continue to add perpetual, Select "View Proposal Detail"to view the proposal to create perpetual.
newContract.successMessage: Congratulations, you have successfully created {symbol} perpetual, select "Continue To Add Perpetual" to continue to add perpetual, select "Run Pool" to run liquidity pool and perpetual.
newContract.expandUniswapPromp: Uniswap v3 stores a list of prices for the TWAP calculator. Longer TWAP time requires more checkpoints.
newContract.invalidAdapterBadAddress: Invalid oracle adapter: bad contract address
newContract.oracleLinkPrompt: No oracle available for the underlying asset, please refer to "SATORI V3 Oracle Seek/Provide Thread" on the SATORI forum.
newContract.markPriceTWAPError: Mark price TWAP must be integer and not less than IndexPrice TWAP
newContract.exceedMaxLeverageWarning: High leverage could result in a liquidation risks. Please make your decision carefully.
newContract.useUncertifiedOracleTip: If you want to use an unregistered oracle, please enter the adapter address in the "custom oracle".
newContract.useUncertifiedOracleTip1: No oracle available for this underlying asset. If you want to use a custom oracle, please use the “Custom Oracle” tab and enter the adapter address.

placeOrder.newTotalLeveragePrompt:
Total Leverage = Total Position Value/Total Margin Value

When you have an existing position and open a new one with different leverages under the same perpetual contract, your actual total position leverage will change based on the total position value and margin value.

The total leverage is alterable by changing the margin or opening new positions with different leverages under the same perpetual contract.
placeOrder.marginRatioPrompt:
Margin Ratio = Maintenance Margin / (Margin Balance - KeeperGasReward)
Maintenance Margin = {mmBalance} {symbol}
Margin Balance = {marginBalance} {symbol}
Your positions will be liquidated once Margin Ratio reaches 100%.
placeOrder.availablePrompt: Available Balance = L2 Wallet Balance - Order Margin
placeOrder.costPrompt: The margin required to execute this order. Reducing a position does not cost margin.
placeOrder.pricePrompt: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
placeOrder.feeRebatePrompt: {rebateRate}% of your transaction fees will be rebated as trading rewards. Rewards will be airdropped daily to your wallet. The SATORI price from the rebate is calculated based on the time-weighted average price (TWAP) on Uniswap from the past 1 hour.

tradePanel.tradeAmountErr: Amount must be less than or equal to {amount} {underlyingAssetSymbol}
tradePanel.minTradeAmountErr: The amount is less than the min trade amount
tradePanel.InsufficientCollateralDepositMsg: Insufficient collateral, you need to deposit {amount} {collateralSymbol}.
tradePanel.triggerPriceBuyTip: When the index price greater than or equal to the trigger price, the buy order will be executed.
tradePanel.triggerPriceSellTip: When the index price less than or equal to the trigger price, the sell order will be executed.
tradePanel.stopLimitPriceBuyError: Limit price must be above than trigger price .
tradePanel.stopLimitPriceSellError: Limit price must be below than trigger price.
tradePanel.marketClosedTip: The contract is not in its trading hours.
tradePanel.insufficientLiquidityWarning: Insufficient liquidity for this trade. Max available:

perpetualRiskNotice.riskNoticeText: This market is created by unknown operators. Anyone can create any market which could come with unexpected risks. Trade at your own risk!

prohibitionUseNotice.riskNoticeFirstText: 1. Please note that both the Arbitrum Network and SATORI are currently in their beta test versions. Any action you take on the platform is strictly at your own risk, please act only under thorough consideration.
prohibitionUseNotice.riskNoticeSecondText: 2. If you would like to trade on SATORI, please make sure you are not a citizen of the following countries
prohibitionUseNotice.countries: Antigua and Barbuda, Algeria, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Belarus, Burundi, Burma (Myanmar), China, Cote D'Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Crimea and Sevastopol, Cuba, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ecuador, Iran, Iraq, Liberia, Libya, Magnitsky, Mali, Morocco, Nepal, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, United States, Venezuela, Yemen, Zimbabwe

tokenImportantDialog.title: Token Important
tokenImportantDialog.message:
Anyone can create an ERC20 token on Ethereum with any name, including creating fake versions of existing tokens and tokens that claim to represent projects that do not have a token.
This interface can load arbitrary tokens by token addresses. Please take extra caution and do your research when interacting with arbitrary ERC20 tokens.
If you purchase an arbitrary token, you may be unable to sell it back.

globalNotification.wrongNetwork: Error: Unknown network. Please switch to {network}.
globalNotification.nodeServerError: {chainName} Network is temporarily unavailable. SATORI will resume once {chainName} Network is operational.
globalNotification.readBlockChainError: Failed to read Ethereum block chain! Retry...
globalNotification.isEmergencyPrompt: Hello everyone, {contractSymbol} has started global settlement . Transactions and withdrawals are not available at this time. After the settlement is completed, users can withdraw all the remaining margin balance.
globalNotification.isGlobalSettledPrompt: Hello everyone, {contractSymbol} has completed the global settlement. Now, the user can click the "Settle" button to settle and withdraw all remaining margin.

globalNotification.oracleChartServerError: SATORI chart service error, unable to update index
globalNotification.ammUnsafePrompt: The perpetual contract is no longer running. Please click button to enter clearing.

dao.vaultAssetPrompt: The asset is used to assist DAO missions; It comes from: share from the fee captured by the ecosystem, newly issued SATORI in the tokenomics and other DAO payments.
dao.vaultAssetPromptMobile: The asset is used to assist DAO missions; It comes from: share from the fee captured by the ecosystem, newly issued SATORI in the tokenomics and other DAO payments.
dao.ammLiquidityMiningPromp: Earn LP profits and mining rewards for contributing to SATORI AMM liquidity.
dao.tradingMiningPromp: Earn SATORI for trading; Rewards will be airdropped daily to your wallet.
dao.swapLiquidityMiningPromp: Earn rewards for contributing to SATORI liquidity

swapLiquidityMiningTip.default: Contribute SATORI liquidity on {swapName} and earn rewards.
swapLiquidityMiningTip.dodoMcbUsdc: Contribute SATORI liquidity (50%SATORI/50%USDC) on DODO to earn DODO + SATORI.
swapLiquidityMiningTip.dodoMcbUsdcToolTip:
Duration: From Sep 15th to Oct 27th
Rewards: 180 SATORI + 4500 DODO / day
swapLiquidityMiningTip.pancakeMcbBnb: Contribute SATORI liquidity (50%SATORI/50%BNB) on PancakeSwap to earn CAKE.
swapLiquidityMiningTip.pancakeMcbBnbToolTip:
1x CAKE rewards for the first 48 hours, and then 0.5x CAKE rewards after that.

Start block: #11793300 (approx. 12pm UTC on October 15th)
Finish block: #13521300 (approx. 12pm UTC on December 14th)
swapLiquidityMiningTip.balancerMcbEthToolTip:
Duration: From Nov 1th to Nov 28th
Rewards: 875 SATORI + 1,600 BAL / week
swapLiquidityMiningTip.balancerMcbEth: Contribute SATORI liquidity (60%SATORI/40%ETH) on Balancer to earn BAL + SATORI.

dao.totalAPYPromp:
30-Day Total APY = 30-Day LP APY + Mining APY
30-Day LP APY = (CurrentNAV - NAV from 30 days ago) / 30 * 365
NAV(Net Asset Value) = PoolMargin / TotalShareToken
LP revenue or loss will be reflected on the NAV, which you can find on the pool info page.
dao.uniswapMiningPrompt:
Get Uniswap LP Token
SATORI-ETH
SATORI-USDC
dao.30dAmmMiningLPApyPromp:
30-Day LP APY = (CurrentNAV - NAV from 30 days ago) / 30 * 365

NAV(Net Asset Value) = PoolMargin / TotalShareToken

LP revenue or loss will be reflected on the NAV, which you can find on the pool info page.
dao.totalRewardsPrompt:
Your Mining Rewards =
Your Transaction Fee × Mining Rebate Rate

{amount}SATORI = ${value}
The SATORI price here is calculated based on the time-weighted average price (TWAP) on Uniswap from the past 1 hour.
dao.APYPromp: Total APY = LP APY + Mining APY LP APY is calculated from the latest 30-day average
dao.mintablePrompt: It is plausible to mint 1 SATORI for 1 USD captured by the SATORI DAO vault. Also, at least 0.2 SATORI can be issued by one Ethereum block (approximately 1300SATORI/day)
dao.aboutVotesPrompt:
Your Votes = Votes based on the number of SATORI in your wallet on Arbitrum + Delegate Votes (you can vote on behalf of other SATORI holders if they choose you as their delegatee)

1 SATORI on Arbitrum = 1 Vote

You can vote on proposals with votes that you hold before the proposal is created.
dao.miningRebateRatePrompt: The ratio of the transaction fee that will be refunded.
dao.youPooledPromp: The asset you pooled = Your LP tokens * Current net asset value
dao.remainingBudgetPrompt: The remaining SATORI in the budget for transaction mining.

holders if they choose you as their delegatee)

governancePage.hasEnoughVotesTip: Currently your number of votes is less than the threshold for creating a proposal, you cannot create a proposal.

createProposalSteps.uploadToIPFS: Back up the proposal to IPFS

marginChangeRiskDialog.title: Margin Requirements Change
marginChangeRiskDialog.message: In order to improve the overall system security, we have increased the margin requirements: maintenance margin 5%, initial margin 6.66%. The liquidation price of your position has also changed. Please pay attention to this adjustment and control the risk.
marginChangeRiskDialog.buttonTip: I understand the changes and risks

delegationDialog.title: Delegation
delegationDialog.tip: You can delegate your voting power to another xSATORI holder.

permissionDeniedDialog.title: Use at your own risk
permissionDeniedDialog.description: SATORI is currently in closed Beta mode; trading and liquidity-related features are only open to verified Beta testers. Additionally, due to potential Arbitrum network instability, you might experience assets loss when network failure happens during trading. Use at your own risk.
permissionDeniedDialog.subtitle: I understand the risks.

createPerpetual.minMaxViolation: The parameter must larger or equal than min value and smaller or equal to max value.
createPerpetual.largerZero: The parameter must be larger than 0.
createPerpetual.ammMaxLeverageMustSmallerThanInitialMarg: AMM max leverage must be smaller than 1 / initial margin rate.

bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.note: Note: Deposits assets could take up to 1 hour.
bridge.arbBridgePromp: Note: Standard withdrawal will be in a "pending" state during a "challenge period" roughly (24 hours on Kovan). After that, the funds will be available on layer 1 in your lockbox.

404.title: Lost in metaverse
404.subtitle:
We can’t seem to find the page you are looking for,
but here are some links instead

shareDialog.title: I'm lovin' my maczombie !
shareDialog.profitText: I’m lovin’ my mac zombie! I just made {rate}% profit on SATORI’s {perpetual} perpetual contracts!
shareDialog.deficitText: Oops, I just had {rate}% loss on SATORI’s {perpetual} perpetual contracts...

nodeStatus.betaMessage: Arbitrum and SATORI are still in beta mode, trade at your own risk!
nodeStatus.bscBetaMessage: SATORI is still in beta mode, trade at your own risk!
nodeStatus.nodeErrorPrompt: Index price and Order book might be out of sync. Sorry for the inconvenience, and please wait for the service to recover.
nodeStatus.graphErrorPrompt: Entry price and pool information might be out of sync. Sorry for the inconvenience, and please wait for the service to recover.
nodeStatus.relayerErrorPrompt: Orders information might be out of sync. Sorry for the inconvenience, and please wait for the service to recover.
nodeStatus.priceChartErrorPrompt: The index chart might be out of sync. Sorry for the inconvenience, and please wait for the service to recover.
nodeStatus.wsErrorPrompt: Open orders status might be out of sync. Sorry for the inconvenience, and please wait for the service to recover.

tradingMining.title: Multi-Chain Trading Mining (Epoch {id})
tradingMining.titleSubDesc: Earn SATORI for trading; Rewards will be claimable five days after each epoch ends.
tradingMining.estimatedForEpochPromp:
Your estimated rewards are calculated based on your and all traders' trader scores.

Please note this estimated number is for reference only; your final trader scores at the end of the epoch will determine your final rewards
tradingMining.totalRewardsPoolPromp: {value} SATORI will be distributed in this epoch as rewards.
tradingMining.claimRewardPromp1:
Currently Claimable: {v1} SATORI
Allocated Rewards: {v2} SATORI
Claimed Rewards: {v3} SATORI
tradingMining.claimRewardPromp2:
Allocated Rewards: {v1} SATORI
Currently Claimable: {v2} SATORI

{v1} SATORI will be claimable after Oct. 23rd 0:00 UTC since rewards are claimable five days after each epoch ends.
tradingMining.totalFeesPaidPromp:
The total fees you paid from trading in this epoch.

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tradingMining.totalAndDaoFeesPaidPromp:
Total fees paid to DAO in this epoch: ${value}
Total trading fees: ${value2}

The total fees paid to DAO will be calculated toward the trader score
It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tradingMining.averageOpenInterestPromp:
The average open interest is the average of all your open long or short positions in USD value. This value is measured every minute across selected markets in this epoch.

EstimatedOpenInterest = (CumulativeOpenInterest + CurrentOpenInterest * ReaminEpochMinutes) / TotalEpochMinutes

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tradingMining.stakingScorePromp:
This value is the average of your staking scores in current epoch; it is measured every minute.

EstimatedScore = (1 - RemainEpochDays / UnlockTimeDays / 2) * CurrentStakingScore * RemainEpochMinutes
StakingScore = (CumulativeStakingScore + EstimatedScore) / TotalEpochMinutes

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tradingMining.stakingScorePromp2:
Recommended staking score: {newStakingScore}

According to your current total fees paid and average open interests, your staking score need to reach the recommended score for optimized rewards earning strategy.

You need to stake additional {stake} SATORI to reach the recommended score; you share of pool will increase to around {percentage}%, and your estimated rewards will be around {reward} SATORI.
tradingMining.stakingScoreWarnTooltip: Please note your staking score is currently 0. You will need to raise staking scores to earn rewards.
tradingMining.desc: Trading Formula: the combination of fees paid, average open interest and staking score determines the SATORI rewards that are available to you each epoch.
tradingMining.allTraderAPYPrompt: Total Rewards Pool * SATORI Price / Total Fees Paid by all Traders
tradingMining.allTraderScorePromp: The current total of all trader's trader scores in this epoch.
tradingMining.yourTraderScorePromp: Your Trader Score = Total Fees Paid ^ 0.7 × Average Open Interest^ 0.3 × Staking Score ^ 0.3
tradingMining.yourShareOfPoolPromp: Your Share of Pool = Your Trader Score / All Traders' Score

tooltip.fee1: Total effective fees for trader score:
tooltip.fee4: The effective fee is the total fees paid to DAO with the anti-wash-trading time-weight factor applied. To discourage the large volume at the end of the epoch, we introduced a time-weight factor to the trading fee; the weight of the trading fee will decrease linearly, and at the end of the epoch, it will become 0.5.
tooltip.fee5: It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tooltip.openInterest1:
The average open interest is the average of all your open long or short positions in USD value. This value is measured every minute across selected markets in this epoch.

EstimatedOpenInterest = (CumulativeOpenInterest + CurrentOpenInterest * ReaminEpochMinutes) / TotalEpochMinutes

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
tooltip.stakingScore1:
This value is the average of your staking scores in current epoch; it is measured every minute.

EstimatedScore = (1 - RemainEpochDays / UnlockTimeDays / 2) * CurrentStakingScore * RemainEpochMinutes
StakingScore = (CumulativeStakingScore + EstimatedScore) / TotalEpochMinutes

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.

stakeDialog.title: Trader SATORI Staking

desc.title: Trader Staking SATORI Lock Time
desc.msg: Your SATORI will be locked for 100 days after staking. If you stake new SATORI while having staked SATORI, the unlock time will be updated.

stakeDialog.currentPromp: Staking Score = Staked SATORI X Unlock Time
stakeDialog.averageInEpochPromp:
This value is the average of your staking scores in current epoch; it is measured every minute.

EstimatedScore = (1 - RemainEpochDays / UnlockTimeDays / 2) * CurrentStakingScore * RemainEpochMinutes
StakingScore = (CumulativeStakingScore + EstimatedScore) / TotalEpochMinutes

It can take up to 10 minutes for the data to update.
stakeDialog.promp1: Staking Score = Staked SATORI X Unlock Time in days
stakeDialog.promp2: The staking score will determine your trading rewards in this epoch.
stakeDialog.promp3: The staking score is directly assoicated with your trader score, which will determine the your trading rewards in this epoch.
stakeDialog.unlockTimePromp:
Unlock Date & Time:
{time}

You can un-stake SATORI after the unlock time. If you stake additional SATORI while having staked ones, the unlock time will update.
stakeDialog.unstakePromp: Your staked SATORI will be locked until {time}.
stakeDialog.unstakePromp2: After unstaking, you can re-stake your SATORI for the staking score, and your lock time will reset.

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Staking
confirmDialog.desc: After staking {value} SATORI, your total {totalValue} SATORI will be locked for {lockedDay} days and cannot be unstaked until the lock time ends.

restakeRiskDialog.title: Confirm Restaking
restakeRiskDialog.riskWarningText: After restaking your {value} SATORI, your unlock time will be reset as 100 days, and your staking score will increase. After restaking, your SATORI will be locked for 100 days and cannot be unstaked until the lock time ends.

historyDialog.title: Epoch History
historyDialog.claimTimeTip1: Epoch {id} rewards will be claimable on

getMcbDialog.title: Get SATORI
getMcbDialog.bsc:
On BSC, you can get SATORI from PancakeSwap,
or bridge your token from Arbitrum or Ethereum.
getMcbDialog.arb: On Arbitrum, you can get SATORI from Uniswap V3, DODO, Balancer, or bridge your token from Ethereum.

prompts.claimableNow1: Week {weekId} gas fee rebate was distributed on {time}; SATORI/BNB price was {price}.
prompts.claimableNow2: Week {weekId} gas fee rebate will be distributed on {time}.
prompts.infoDesc1: Eligible orders (market, limit and stop-limit) gas spendings will be rebated and distributed as SATORI weekly, 3 days after each week ends.
prompts.infoDesc2: All orders with over $100 volume are eligible for the rebate; only two orders under $100 volume are eligible daily.
prompts.infoDesc3: For limit and stop-limit orders, only the spent broker gas is eligible for the rebate.
prompts.infoDesc4: Weekly claimable SATORI is calculated based on the real-time SATORI/BNB price by the distribution time.
prompts.infoDesc5: Contract addresses are not eligible for the rebate.
prompts.infoDesc6After: (set through gas settings) are not eligible for the rebate.
prompts.infoDesc6Prompt: We found that some traders set unreasonable transaction gas prices to take advantage of the rebate resources. Therefore, we decided to modify the gas rebate rules: transactions with unreasonable gas prices will not be counted in the scope of the reward. The modification starts at BSC block 13204269.
prompts.endInfoDesc: The {name} gas fee rebate program has ended. Thanks for your participation, and please claim unclaimed SATORI.
prompts.rebatedClaimed: Weekly rebated SATORI is calculated based on the real-time SATORI/BNB price by the distritution time.
prompts.price: SATORI/BNB price by the distribution time: {price}
prompts.claimTimeTip: Week {id} rebate will be claimable on

mobileSwitchChainDialog.title: Please switch the network on your mobile wallet first.
mobileSwitchChainDialog.content: Please switch the network on your mobile wallet to {chainName} first, then change the network here.
